name: Total expenditures for R&D performed by nonprofit organizations, by type of nonprofit organization and type of cost: FY 2022
description: Total expenditures for R&D performed by nonprofit organizations, by type of nonprofit organization and type of cost: FY 2022

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

variableMeasured.name: field_type_of_cost_salaries_wages_and_fringe_benefits
variableMeasured.description: Type Of Cost Salaries Wages And Fringe Benefits

variableMeasured.name: field_type_of_cost_expensed_machinery_and_equipment
variableMeasured.description: Type Of Cost Expensed Machinery And Equipment

variableMeasured.name: field_type_of_cost_materials_and_supplies
variableMeasured.description: Type Of Cost Materials And Supplies

variableMeasured.name: field_type_of_cost_all_other_costs
variableMeasured.description: Type Of Cost All Other Costs

notes: These data exclude nonprofit universities and colleges and federally funded research and development centers administered by nonprofit organizations. Detail may not add to total because of rounding.
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics and Census Bureau, Nonprofit Research Activities FY 2022 module of the 2023 Annual Business Survey.
